name: Ninshitzu
description:
They said a dog couldn't be a black belt. They didn't count on Ninshitzu.

Dodge the belly rubs and become a black collar dojo master!

* Made in 1 week as a gamejam-style project.

Controls
  • Move - wasd
  • Space (still) - parry
  • Space (moving) - dodge
  • Space (double tap) - Poop 

You can also use an Xbox controller and the A button.

How to play
  • Dodge an enemy attack to turn their headband yellow
  • Parry a yellow-headband enemy to retire them
  • Biscuits heal you + replenish ammo
  • Poops damage enemies and briefly stuns all enemies

Hard mode lets damaged enemies heal if you don't parry them!

---------------------------------------------------

Music by https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise used under a CC license. Tracks used from the Towel Defence OST.

  • Title: Towel Defense Comic
  • Gameplay: Towel Defence Splash Screen
  • Win Jingle: Towel Defence Jingle Win
  • Lose Jingle: Towel Defence Jingle Loose
